error.message: Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Call to deprecated function pager_default_initialize(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Pager\PagerManagerInterface->defaultInitialize() instead.
Class Drupal\styleguide\Plugin\Styleguide\CommentStyleguide was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Class Drupal\styleguide\Plugin\Styleguide\DefaultStyleguide was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Class Drupal\styleguide\Plugin\Styleguide\ImageStyleguide was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Class Drupal\styleguide\Plugin\Styleguide\SearchStyleguide was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to styleguide.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
